EmailTemplate.name: Banking Drip Campaign.Global Banking - Send Email 5.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Trustworthy Information Sources for Bankers
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${CTAText} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Here are top resources you can trust to keep your {{company.Company Name:default=financial institution}} and customers informed—plus information from top analysts to tweak your ongoing COVID-19 strategy. Ready to meet the challenge head on? ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> In a time of uncertainty, count on NCR.
We’re in the trenches with our customers, working hard to help provide guidance, solutions and recommendations <[[https://www.ncr.com/coronavirus/banking]]> during the COVID-19 outbreak.
To learn more, visit NCR.com/banking <[[https://www.ncr.com/banking]]> or contact your local representative.
